text:
Lorcan 'Larry' Gogan (6 May 1938 – 7 January 2020) was an Irish broadcaster. He worked for Raidió Teilifís Éireann (RTÉ).
He was a disc jockey on RTÉ Gold having worked on RTÉ 2fm. His show was "[https://wikiinformer.com/larry-gogan/ The Golden Hour]", during which Larry played old classic songs.
